General.Name: Guang Dong Sitong Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guang Dong Sitong Group Co.,Ltd researches and develops, designs, produces, and sells ceramic products in China. The company offers sanitary ware sets, accessories, shower kits, faucet, urinal, squatting pans, bathroom cabinet, pillar basin, women's washers, smart toilets, one-piece toilets, and spilt toilet products, as well as counter, countertop, and art basins. Guang Dong Sitong Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Chaozhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Wu  Wu
4.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Head of the Admin. Department
